member.name: INotificationActivationCallback.Activate
member.summary: Called when a user interacts with a toast in the action center.
member.param: The unique identifier representing your app to the notification platform.
Arguments from the invoked button. NULL if the toast indicates the default activation and no launch arguments were specified in the XML payload.
The data from the input elements available on the notification toast.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INotificationActivationCallback
member.summary: Receives notification messages when an app is triggered through a toast from the action center.
